assignments.description: Sets the PA Contact variable based on Screen inputs.
assignments.name: SET_PA_Contact
assignments.label: SET_PA_Contact

assignments.description: SETS the contact record found in the Lookup as the Co-Sponsor on the Program Engagement record.
assignments.name: SET_ProgEng_CoSponsor_Lookup
assignments.label: SET_ProgEng_CoSponsor_Lookup

assignments.description: Sets the new contact record as the value in the CoSponsor A field on the ProgEng sObj.
assignments.name: SET_ProgEng_CoSponsor_NewContact
assignments.label: SET_ProgEng_CoSponsor_NewContact

decisions.description: Checks if the user click 'yes' to create a new record for the Co-Sponsor, and if so, creates new record based on input then assigns to ProgEng, and if not, assigns Contact.ID in Lookup to ProgEng.
decisions.name: CHECK_CreatedNewCosponsorRecord
decisions.label: CHECK_CreatedNewCosponsorRecord?

Flow.description: Screen Flow to support creating a Household of Contacts and enrolling them in the Refugees Program (PMM).
Flow.label: Refugees Program Enrolment

recordCreates.description: Creates relationship record between Co-Sponsor and Principal Applicant.
recordCreates.name: CREATE_Co_Sponsor_Relationship
recordCreates.label: CREATE Co-Sponsor Relationship

recordCreates.description: Creates relationship record between Co-Sponsor and Principal Applicant.
recordCreates.name: CREATE_Co_Sponsor_Relationship_0
recordCreates.label: CREATE Co-Sponsor Relationship

recordCreates.description: Creates a new Contact record for the CoSponsor
recordCreates.name: CREATE_CoSponsorContact
recordCreates.label: CREATE Co-Sponsor Contact

fields.name: varT_WelcomeMessage
fields.fieldText: Welcome to the Household Refugees Program Enrolment form! Begin by selecting the Refugees Program and, optionally, a Program Cohort:

screens.description: As if the user wants to add additional members.
screens.name: S03_AddAdditionalHouseholdMembers
screens.label: S03_Additional Household Members?

fields.name: ch_AddMoreHHMembers
fields.fieldText: Would you like to add another Household Member to the Refugee application??

screens.description: Final major screen for entering Refugee Application information proper (to be saved on the Program Engagement record).
screens.name: S05_ProgramEngagement
screens.label: S05_ProgramEngagement

fields.name: varT_ReviewHousehold
fields.fieldText: Review the Household Members' information prior to proceeding.

value.stringValue: FirstName:148, LastName:148, Birthdate:148, MobilePhone:148, Email:148, MailingCountry:148

screens.description: Final major screen for entering Refugee Application information proper (to be saved on the Program Engagement record).
screens.name: S05_ProgramEngagement_0
screens.label: S05_ProgramEngagement

screens.description: Congratulations - you've enrolled a new family in the Refugees Program!
screens.name: S06_CongratuationsScreen
screens.label: S06_Final Confirmation Screen

fields.name: varT_CongratulationsText
fields.fieldText:
Congratulations - you've enrolled a new family in the Refugees Program!


Principal Applicant: {!var_sObj_PAContact.FirstName} {!var_sObj_PAContact.LastName}

Household: {!var_sObj_HHAccount.Name}

Number of Household Members: {!var_Counter}


Click here to visit their Program Engagement record!

fields.name: varC_CreateNewCoSponsorContact
fields.fieldText: I need to create a new Co-Sponsor record.
fields.helpText: If when searching for the Co-Sponsor's contact record you are unable to find it, check this box to create a new contact record for the Co-Sponsor.

variables.description: Saves the new Program Engagement ID, for creation of the hyperlink in the final Success Screen
variables.name: var_NewProgEngId

variables.description: Temp sObject for holding temp variables for creating multiple Contacts belonging to the same household.
variables.name: var_sObj_HHContact

variables.description: Record variable for creating the Principle Applicant's Contact record.
variables.name: var_sObj_PAContact
